info.title: GBU-X Demo FOM Service API Version 1.0.1
info.description: API for calculating trajectories and retrieving information about a GBU-X weapon variants.

post.description: Provides all requested calculation results for the specified weapon varaint utilizing the conditions set for calculation.

requestBody.description: A JSON-formatted string of a collection of calculation parameters to be used for calculation. The calculation parameters should follow the prescribed format for calculation parameters as listed in this schema.

200.description: A JSON-formatted string of calculation results. The calculation results should follow the prescribed format for calculation results as listed in this schema.

get.description: Provides information regarding the FOM and its weapon variants.

200.description: A JSON-formatted string of FOM information. The information should follow the prescribed format for FOM information as listed in this schema.

weaponId.description: The unique weapon variant id that will be used when calculating the parameters.

CalculationParameters.description: Item for holding calculation conditions to be used when requesting calculation.

errorMessages.description: Collection of applicable error messages related to the calculating of the provided parameters.

CalculationResult.description: Holds all calculation results for a calculation request.

CalculationResults.description: Aggregated results from one or more calculation requests.

minimum.description: The minimum value of the constraint.

maximum.description: The maximum value of the constraint.

latitude.description: The WGS-84 latitude position in decimal degrees.

longitude.description: The WGS-84 longitude position in decimal degrees.

Coordinate.description: Holds latitude and longtiude position data.

armTimes.description: The arm times of the fuze in seconds.

functionTimes.description: The function times of the fuze in milliseconds.

hobSettings.description: The potential height of burst values of the fuze in feet.

locations.description: The valid locations for the fuze on the weapon.

FuzeData.description: Basic fuze data information related to a particular fuze for a weapon.

FuzeLocation.description: Available fuze locations within a weapon.

confidence.description: The confidence level of the horizontal and vertical accuracies of the DPI. The value should be either 50 or 90 percent.

horizontalAccuracy.description: The horizontal accuracy (in feet) of the Circular Error Probable (CEP) of the DPI location.  The value range should be between 0 - 1000 feet.

impactAngle.description: The desired terminal impact angle (in degrees) of the weapon relative to local level (0 = fly into a vertical wall, 90 = fly straight down). The value range should be between 0 - 90 degrees.

impactAngleLowerTolerance.description: The Delta value (in degrees) to apply to the commanded impact angle to determine the acceptable lower limit for impact angles (e.g., a value of 10 associated with an angle of 65 results in a minimum acceptable impact angle of 55 degrees). The value range should be between 0 - 90 degrees.

impactAngleUpperTolerance.description: The Delta value (in degrees) to apply to the commanded impact angle to determine the acceptable upper limit for impact angles (e.g., a value of 10 associated with an angle of 65 results in a maximum acceptable impact angle of 75 degrees). The value range should be between 0 - 90 degrees.

impactAzimuth.description: The desired impact azimuth relative to north (0 = fly north, 90 = fly east). The value range should be between 0 - 359.9 degrees.

impactAzimuthLeftTolerance.description: The Delta value (in degrees) to apply to the commanded impact azimuth to determine the range of acceptable impact azimuths to the left of the weapon course (e.g., a value of 10 with an azimuth of 45 results in impact azimuths from 35 to 45 being considered). The value range should be between 0 - 359.9 degrees.

impactAzimuthRightTolerance.description: The Delta value (in degrees) to apply to the commanded impact azimuth to determine the range of acceptable impact azimuths to the right of the weapon course (e.g., a value of 10 with an azimuth of 45 results in impact azimuths from 45 to 55 being considered). The value range should be between 0 - 359.9 degrees.

minImpactVelocity.description: The desired minimum velocity of the weapon at impact in feet per second. The value range should be between 0 - 26874 feet per second.

verticalAccuracy.description: The vertical accuracy Linear Error Probable (LEP) of the JDPI location in feet. The value range should be between 0 and 1000 feet.

ImpactConditions.description: Contains the impact conditions to be used for FOM calculation requests.

ImpactConstraints.description: Impact constraints for a weapon variant.

items.description: Laser code for the weapon variant.

laserCodes.description: Valid laser codes for the weapon variant.

laserPulseLogicSettings.description: Laser pulse logic settings of the weapon variant.

LaserPulseLogicSetting.description: Potential Laser Pulse Logic Setting within a weapon.

allOf.description: All the information concerning a specific laser weapon variant.

altitude.description: The height above elevation (HAE) altitude position of the location in feet.

MinMaxRegion.description: The minimum and maximum data of a Launch Acceptability Region (LAR).

errorMessages.description: Applicable error messages for the region calculation.

boundingCoordinates.description: The bounding coordinates around the region.

RegionResults.description: Holds the calculated results for a region.

aircraftAirspeed.description: The aircraft true airspeed (Mach) at the weapon release point.  The value range should be between 0.1 and 2.0 Mach.

aircraftCourse.description: The aircraft true course (in degrees true) at the weapon release point (direction of the horizontal component of velocity, 0 = north, 90 = east). The value range should be between 0.0 and 359.9 degrees.

aircraftFlightPathAngle.description: The flight path angle (in degrees) of the aircraft at the weapon release point. A positive value indicates a climb. The value range should be between -45.0 - 45.0 degrees.

aircraftRoll.description: The roll angle of the aircraft (in degerees) at the weapon release point (positive value is left wing up; 0 is a wings level release). The value range should be between -90.0 - 90.0 degrees.

aircraftAltitude.description: The height above elevation (HAE) altitude position (in feet) of the aircraft at the weapon relase point.

launchDateTime.description: The date and time (Zulu) at the weapon release point.

ReleaseConditions.description: Contains the release conditions to be used for FOM calculation requests.

ReleaseConstraints.description: Release constraints for a weapon variant.

calculateAll.description: Indicates if all results are being requested.

calculateFlyout.description: Indicates if the flyout trajectory results are being requested.

calculateInZoneLAR.description: Indicates if the In Zone LAR results are being requested.

calculateInRangeLAR.description: Indicates if the In Range LAR results are being requested.

calculateInZoneFootprint.description: Indicates if the In Zone Footprint results are being requested.

calculateInRangeFootprint.description: Indicates if the In Range Footprint results are being requested.

calculateInZoneMinMaxLAR.description: Indicates if the In Zone Min Max LAR results are being requested.

calculateInRangeMinMaxLAR.description: Indicates if the In Range Min Max LAR results are being requested.

ResultsRequested.description: Holds values to indicate which results are being requested as part of the calculation request. If a value is excluded, it will be treated as false.

TargetOrientation.description: The orientation values for a target.

elapsedTime.description: The elapsed time (seconds) from the beginning of flight.

TrajectoryPoint.description: Holds data for a specific point on a flyout trajectory.

errorMessages.description: Error messages for the trajectory calculation.

impactAngle.description: The predicted impact angle (in degrees). The value range should be between 0.0 - 90.0 degrees.

impactAzimuth.description: The predicted impact azimuth (in degrees). The value range should be between 0.0 - 359.9 degrees.

impactVelocity.description: The predicted impact velocity in feet per second. The value range should be between 0.0 - 26874.0 feet per second.

path.description: A list of coordinates and elevations that the trajectory traverses paired with their respective elapsed times.

timeOfFlight.description: The predicted time of flight (seconds) from weapon release to impact. The value range should be between 0.0 - 1500.0 seconds.

TrajectoryResults.description: Contains the results of a calculated flyout trajectory.

name.description: The name of the weapon variant.

weaponId.description: The FPMID for the weapon variant.

longDescription.description: In-depth information about the weapon variant.

shortDescription.description: Short description of the weapon variant.

fuzeData.description: All fuze data information concerning a weapon variant.

weaponAPI.description: The most current API for the weapon FOM service.

weaponFamily.description: The name of the weapon family that the weapon belongs to.

WeaponVariant.description: All the information concerning a specific weapon variant.

name: GBU-X
